body_html:
I checked the error message and found that it was caused due to the mean of Q was bigger than 0. over the threshold. (In this case, mean of Q is 0.04, bigger than +- 0.03).
However, if I change the shape of array or change the seed (123 to 124 for example), the test will be fine.
So I guess the error is from minor instability and it's permissible ?

body:
I checked the error message and found that it was caused due to the mean of Q was bigger than 0. over the threshold. (In this case, mean of Q is  0.04, bigger than +- 0.03).
However, if I change the shape of array or change the seed (123 to 124 for example), the test will be fine.
So I guess the error is from minor instability and it's permissible ?
